document.full_text: authorities will start opening a key spillway by early saturday evening to relieve the swollen mississippi river and avoid flooding louisiana's two largest cities although potentially swamping thousands of homes and acres of crops.
document.title: army engineers to open key louisiana spillway
lines_and_colors: authorities will start opening a key spillway by early saturday evening to relieve the swollen mississippi river and avoid flooding louisiana's two largest cities although potentially swamping thousands of homes and acres of crops.
